categories.name: Hidden Object Adventure Games for PC

description.html:
Elephant Games returns to the world of mind-bending, mythological monsters with a new entry in the Chimeras series!

It’s the dream of every cinephile! A long-lost film has resurfaced, and movie fan Vanessa Rossi intends to be at the first screening since the so-called “cursed” premier 20 years ago. But when the lights go down and the movie starts, she quickly discovers that the curse is all too real! Now, Vanessa must unravel multiple layers of mysteries, taking on the role of the detective inside the movie to solve a series of assassinations while simultaneously uncovering the film’s plot in the hopes of unlocking the secret of the curse and finding a way out! Who is trying to kill Katarina Verdi, and why? What caused the curse? Set the plot straight in this new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure game that takes immersion to the next level!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version.

The Collector’s Edition includes:

items.meta_description: The screening of a lost film reveals a long-forgotten curse!
items.name: Chimeras: The Lost Film Collector's Edition

attribute_labels.label: Meilleures ventes - De tous les temps

entered_attribute_value.value: Unravel the secrets of a mysterious cabal in the bonus game!
Replay your favorite HOPs and mini-games, earn achievements, and solve a puzzle!
Tons of puzzle pieces and movie posters to find!
Enjoy exclusive wallpapers, screensavers, music, and more!
Solve the case in style with the strategy guide!
